caption: Figure 3: Relationships between FID-50K and sample time across varying inference hyperparameters. We compare different numbers of sampling iterations (N) on the left and varying diffusion timesteps (T) on the right for three model sizes.
description: The chart displays the relationship between FID-50K score and sample time for different numbers of sampling iterations and diffusion timesteps across three model sizes.

caption: Figure 4: Evaluation of generative and discriminative performance across different model sizes. We report results for all tested tokenizers across four different dimensions of binary codes. We include the reconstruction FID (rFID) for each binary tokenizer for reference (grey points).
description: Figure 4 shows the generative and discriminative performance of BiGR models with varying sizes and dimensions of binary codes.
